name: Springlock Massacre
description:
CONTROLS:

Press D to shut the door on Fredbear to dim his eyes

(don't let his eyes get too bright)

Press A to turn on the vent lights to find springtrap

(if springtrap is in the vent Press W to make him go away)

Press S to open the camera to check on security puppet (Press SPACE to wind the music box on the camera)

(the crying child will get you if your battery runs out)
